title: Garden-style 1 BR / 1 BA in Tarzana. Visit us today!
posting_body: ['The Pavillion', 'Leasing Office:', '5680 Reseda Blvd', 'Tarzana, CA 91356', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what The Pavillion has to offer!', 'Lush green shrubs and trees surround the exterior of the Pavillion Apartment community.', "Liberally splashed with flowers and sun dapples, it's as peaceful a location outside as it is inside.", "The courtyard's crystal-clear pool and spa are yours to relax in, and an array of comfortable seating makes it easy to catch a few evening sunrays.", 'Indoors, the apartments feature a balance of modern detail and cozy atmosphere.', 'Clean, open walls and natural light give a breezy, spacious feel to your home, and carefully designed floor plans provide plenty of ways to arrange your furniture and décor the way you like it.', 'Rental Information:', '1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom / Call / $1855/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '− Air Conditioning', '− Ceiling Fan', '− Furnished Apartments Available', '− Garbage Disposal', '− Heating', '− High Speed Internet Access', '− Mirrored Wardrobe Closet (Select Units)', '− New Carpet (In Select Units)', '− Refrigerator (Available To Rent)', '− Vertical Blinds', 'Additional Information:', '− Assigned Parking', '− BBQ Pit Area', '− Beautiful Courtyard', '− Gated Parking', '− Laundry Facility', '− Outdoor Pool and Spa', '− Sorry, No Pets', '− Sun Deck Area', '− Close to 101 and I-405 Freeways', '− Close to Ventura Blvd', '− Controlled Access Entry', '− Friendly, Professional On-\xadSite Management', '− Near Shopping and Dining', '− Next to Metro Orange Line', '− Responsive Maintenance', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Sat: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'No pets allowed;', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Carlo, Inc', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8FFCA9DC75834F8']
